articles.title: How Vladimir Putin's war in Ukraine is forcing his friends to choose between Russia and the West - ABC News
articles.description: As the death toll climbs in Ukraine and pressure mounts for neighbours to intervene, European leaders who have stoked friendships with both the West and Russia may soon be forced to pick a side.
articles.content:
As Vladimir Putin's troops rolled into Ukraine in late February, the imagery of Russian tanks lining up at the border was accompanied by a cacophony of outrage from world leaders.
